law.catch_line: A license or registration suspended under this subtitle shall remain suspended and may not be renewe...
law.text:
A license or registration suspended under this subtitle shall remain suspended and may not be renewed or reissued, and a new or original license or registration may not be issued to the judgment debtor until the judgment:
Is stayed;
Is satisfied; or
Is subject to one of the exceptions stated in § 17-206 or § 17-209 of this subtitle.
